data.oai_dc:dc: NOAA Daily Surface Meteorologic Data at NCDC Tavernier Station (ID-088841), South Florida from March 1948 to September 2005
The National Climatic Data Center's (NOAA) daily mean, maximum, and minium air temperatures and daily precipitation collected at Tavernier Station (Coop ID- 088841).
Everglades|South Florida|air temperature|precipitation|Florida Coastal Everglades LTER Program|1948|2005|Tavernier Station
